name: Cat Tails
description:
Cat Tails is now FREE! Play it today!

Join Salio on an adventure to take back the stolen lunch of a fisherman's! In this 2D action platformer, you and Salio will travel across 25 action-packed levels and defeat powerful bosses who stand in her way!

The full game package comes with a game manual full of hints and tips on how to defeat all of the enemies and conquer all of the obstacles!

Minimum Requirements

  • Microsoft Windows XP SP3
  • The latest version of DirectX 9.0c
  • Single-core processor running at least 1.6 GHz
  • 512 MB of RAM

Follow Echo Flute on Twitter @echoflutedev!
